author: breser
msg: Also removes deprication warning from using svn_diff_file_output_unified3().
(main): Know to capture the argument following -U so
svn_diff_file_options_parse() can capture the context size.

author: stsp
msg: (merge_file_opened, merge_dir_opened): Look for merge-left node kind in

author: stsp
msg: (merge_file_opened, merge_dir_opened): Preserve the merge-left node kind
when updating a tree conflict involving a replacement.
(merge_file_deleted): This function cannot tell if the deleted node is going
to be replaced, so checking the 'add_is_replace' flag here is pointless.
Record the merge-right node kind as 'none' a is appropriate for a deletion,
and rely on merge_file_opened() and merge_dir_opened() to tweak node kind
